title: Amy Makes Decision On Crazy House Offer + Raymundo Wants To Buy Something Disgusting + Steven Curtis Chapman Talks Hairstyles
itunes:title: Amy Makes Decision On Crazy House Offer + Raymundo Wants To Buy Something Disgusting + Steven Curtis Chapman Talks Hairstyles
description:
Amy's house wasn't on the market, but someone still put an offer in to buy it sight unseen. She updates us on that situation. Raymundo wants to buy something that we all think is totally ridiculous. Plus, we talk with Steven Curtis Chapman about his new song, why he chose three names and his many hairstyles throughout the years!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
